title: Circular motion - minimum speed in vertical circle

content.question: In a classroom demonstration, an instructor swings a <math alttext="0.10 kilogram" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.10</mn><mo> </mo><mi>kg</mi></math> object on a rope in a vertical circle of radius <math alttext="0.40 meter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.40</mn><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math>. What is the minimum speed the object can have at the highest point in its circular path and still stay in circular motion?
